roleset.name: stick, cause to stick

role.descr: agent, entity causing two objects to be attached

roles.note: I've added an arg 2 so we no longer have multiple arg 1s appearing

example.name: arg 1 when only 1 attached item is mentioned

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Slight comparison to attach.01. Attach.01 is a member of VN class shake-22.3-2-1. No FN class. Framed by Katie
